long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Adds a button to YouTube videos that allows you to save your current position in the video as a Stamp. Whenever you watch that video in the future, just click on the extension icon to see your Stamps for that video, and quickly jump to your favorite moments by clicking the play button! Now you can stop scrubbing your way through YouTube videos to find your favorite spots. 

Stamp icons created by Freepik - Flaticon.
